last_episode_to_air.name: Twerkin' 9 to 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tamera worries about making her voice heard among the four co-hosts of her new talk show; Tia misses Cory while she works on her sitcom.

name: Tia & Tamera
overview: Tia & Tamera is an American reality television series on the Style Network. Originally titled Tia & Tamera Take 2, the series started off as a television special that aired on July 17, 2010. It was announced in February 2011 that the special was picked to series. Later, the series was changed to its current title and debuted on August 8, 2011. In September 2011, Style Network renewed the show for a second season, which later premiered on June 11, 2012. Season 3 was announced on February 12, 2013, with it premiering on July 14, 2013. The third season concluded September 22, 2013, and was the last program to air on Style, which rebranded as Esquire Network the next day; the future of the show is unknown. The series is currently airing reruns on Oxygen starting on September 26, 2013. Then on October 15, 2013, Tia & Tamera will start airing reruns on its new home network E! along with Giuliana & Bill.

episodes.name: Sisters and Babies and Weddings Oh My!
episodes.overview: In the opener, Tia deals with her first pregnancy and Tamera plans her wedding.

episodes.name: Last Fling Before the Ring
episodes.overview: Tamera prepares for her bachelorette weekend; Tia has to decide on a birthing plan.

episodes.name: The Wedding Forecast: Rain
episodes.overview: Tamera's wedding weekend is finally here but bad weather and Tia's late arrival are threatening her dream-wedding.

episodes.name: Family Feud
episodes.overview: The girls vent their frustrations regarding the wedding weekend but when it turns into a shouting match; Tia tries everything to get her breeched baby turned.

episodes.name: Two's A Crowd
episodes.overview: Tia must decide whether or not to get a risky procedure; Tamera struggles with Adam moving in.

episodes.name: Acting the Part
episodes.overview: Tia has to bring someone in to help her get the baby nursery finished in time; Tamera prepares herself to reenter the acting game.

episodes.name: Sisters Under Pressure
episodes.overview: Tamera gets a call from her manager asking her to cohost Access Hollywood. After mulling over the idea, Tia convinces Tamera to take the gig--but when she finds out the show is taped live, her nerves really kick in. Meanwhile, Tia is under doctor's orders to remain on bed rest until her scheduled C-section--but she stresses out over a laundry list of things to take care of before the baby's arrival. When Tamera offers to help her out, it's both a blessing and a curse. Plus, Tamera gets inspired to do something nice for the armed forces, and Tia and Cory struggle to find a pediatrician who shares their same beliefs on infant vaccinations.

episodes.name: You Me and Baby Makes Three
episodes.overview: Tia finally gives birth to her son Cree and adjusts to life as a new mom. But she quickly becomes overwhelmed when she only has weeks to move her family to Atlanta where she will begin shooting a new season of The Game, find a new house and shed her baby weight in order to be camera-ready! Meanwhile, Tamera starts thinking about starting a family of her own, but wonders if she may be jumping into it too fast.

episodes.name: Sister Secrets
episodes.overview: The second season begins with Tia struggling to be a full-time mom and Tamera trying to split her time between her Napa home and Los Angeles without hindering her career.

episodes.name: New York, New Image
episodes.overview: The girls travel to New York City, where Tamera struggles to present a more grown-up image of herself to fashion-magazine editors. Meanwhile, Tia sets out to prove to her sister that moms know how to have fun.

episodes.name: Are You Jealous?
episodes.overview: Tamera struggles to find balance between her life in Los Angeles and her new home in Napa; Tia's "to do" list overwhelms her before she leaves to make a movie.

episodes.name: The Cree-Cree Crawl
episodes.overview: Tia reevaluates her life after she misses Cree crawling for the first time. Meanwhile, Tamera considers taking a step back from pilot season to avoid exhausting herself in a job search.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Confrontation
episodes.overview: Tamera and Jerome visit Tia in Utah and give her the family support she needs while she's making a movie and trying to be a good mom for Cree.

episodes.name: Holey Mole-y!
episodes.overview: Tia worries about a potentially dangerous mole; Tamera contemplates expanding her family and babysits Cree.

episodes.name: Failure to Communicate
episodes.overview: Tia teaches Cree baby sign language, and Tamera prepares to deliver a speech to high-school students. Meanwhile, the sisters seek professional help to better communicate with each other.

episodes.name: Bye-Bye Baby Belly
episodes.overview: Tamera considers moving, and Tia struggles with her body image. Later, the twins mentor young performers during a fashion fund-raiser.

episodes.name: Too Much Napa Whine
episodes.overview: Tamera prepares for a housewarming party; Tia deals with separation anxiety when she leaves Cree for the first time.

episodes.name: South Africa
episodes.overview: Tamera treks to South Africa, where she faces wild animals via a safari and dives with great white sharks.

episodes.name: Are You Pregnant?
episodes.overview: An exciting discovery comes Tamera's way, but she must keep the big news a secret. Meanwhile, Tia anticipates her first Mother's Day, but preparations for her inaugural book tour cause complications

episodes.name: Game, Over
episodes.overview: Tia faces a big decision about her role on "The Game"; Tamera struggles with being a working mom when she begins shooting a TV movie.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Cree Cree
episodes.overview: Tia plans a birthday party for Cree; Tamera tries to determine if her dog is sick when it starts acting strange.

episodes.name: Bahamas Mamas
episodes.overview: Tia and Tamera visit the Bahamas to learn more about their ancestry.

episodes.name: Almost Naked and Famous
episodes.overview: Tamera creates a shop to benefit a local charity. Meanwhile, Tia struggles with posing for a bikini shoot and tries to find a solution for Cree's restless sleeping patterns.

episodes.name: Doula Right Thing
episodes.overview: Tia plants a garden and receives an unexpected job offer; Tamera hires a doula as she plans for a natural childbirth.

episodes.name: Adventures in Baby Showers
episodes.overview: Tia plans a baby shower for Tamera; Tamera brews a lactation tea.

episodes.name: Tussle & Flow
episodes.overview: Tamera gets involved with Jerome's recording session and builds a baby nursery. Meanwhile, Tia makes a yoga video.

episodes.name: Twindividuals
episodes.overview: Tia and Tamera comment on moments from the series.

episodes.name: Twinventors
episodes.overview: Tia and Tamera work on a lactation drink. Also: Tamera worries about postpartum depression and debates whether or not to post pregnancy pictures of herself on the Internet.

episodes.name: Stripteased
episodes.overview: Tia decides to add some spice to her marriage by taking a sexy dance class. Meanwhile, Tamera wants to have a night out with her girlfriends before the baby is born; and has a talk with Adam about their child's racial identity.

episodes.name: Overdue and Over It!
episodes.overview: Tamera prepares for her baby's arrival, but fails to involve her sister in last-minute preparations; Tia gets bad news about her television project.

episodes.name: V-Steam My What?
episodes.overview: Tamera works with a friend to create a sitcom. Tia goes to a red-carpet event while she waits for news regarding her pilot.

episodes.name: My Wife's a Stripper?
episodes.overview: Tia and Tamera pursue the advancement of their careers. Tia lets loose and attends a how-to burlesque class while Tamera sets up a girls poker night prior to her event in Vegas.

episodes.name: The House Always Wins
episodes.overview: Tamera continues to improve her poker skills for her upcoming celebrity poker tournament. Tia feels that the duo would be stronger if they merged their talents, which is when Tamera reveals the business ventures she already has going on.

episodes.name: Sistervention
episodes.overview: Tamera is forced to skip Tia's celebration party for her pilot when she encounters health issues. Jerome and Tia go out for an adventurous zip lining trip. Tia works to give Tamera's closet a makeover.

episodes.name: Boot Camp Brawl
episodes.overview: Tia becomes unsatisfied with her weight after some images are posted on the internet, which leads to her signing up for a weight loss boot camp with Tamera and Jerome also taking part.

episodes.name: Mo' Baby Mo' Problems
episodes.overview: With her new series starting production, Tia comes to the conclusion that having a second child should wait. Tamera goes in to audition a hosting position.

episodes.name: Raising Cree
episodes.overview: The sisters have differing opinions on how to handle their maternity brand; Tia plans her will and visits a fertility specialist.

episodes.name: The Truth About the Twins
episodes.overview: Tia takes a DNA test when Tamera suspects she and her sister may not be identical twins; the sisters cannot agree on a scent for a new product.

episodes.name: Dine at the Y
episodes.overview: Tamera must make some difficult changes when her talk show is picked up; Tia takes part in an ad campaign for an animal-rights organization.

episodes.name: Twerkin' 9 to 5
episodes.overview: Tamera worries about making her voice heard among the four co-hosts of her new talk show; Tia misses Cory while she works on her sitcom.
